about_the_game:
Game Features

  • Buy and Develop Land: Increase the value of your land by developing profitable projects.

  • Build Homes and Buildings: Bring your dream projects to life, from modern homes to massive commercial structures.

  • Purchase Vehicles and Equipment: Acquire the tools and machinery you need to optimize your construction tasks.

  • Economic Simulation: Manage your budget carefully, reduce costs, and make strategic decisions to maximize your profits.

  • Strategic Management: Organize your workforce, meet client demands, and become a successful CEO.

What Can You Do?

  • Invest in land and generate great returns through smart moves.

  • Earn your clients' trust by completing projects on time.

  • Outpace your competitors with city-enhancing projects.

Contractor Simulator transforms real-world construction and management processes into a fun simulation experience, appealing to construction enthusiasts and strategy game lovers alike.

Add it to your wishlist now and start writing your story in the construction world!

Contractor Simulator transforms real-world construction and management processes into a fun simulation experience, appealing to construction enthusiasts and strategy game lovers alike.

Add it to your wishlist now and start writing your story in the construction world!
name: Contractor Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Are you ready to build your dream construction empire? Contractor Simulator offers players the opportunity to lead in a construction world filled with rich content and strategic decisions.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Simplified Chinese*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
